Package ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.ime

Interface Summary
IObservable Interface to be implemented for an observable object (AKA Subject) according to the Observer pattern.
IObserver Interface to be implemented for an Observer according to the Observer pattern.
 

Class Summary
CandidateView Implementation of a candidate View for our IME.
HandwritingIME A basic implementation of the InputMethodService for our IME.
LatinKeyboard Implementation of a Latin Keyboard for our IME.
LatinKeyboard.LatinKey  
PadView Implementation of a KeyboardView to gather data for the DetectionService.
ServiceTest Activity we used to test the proper operation of our DetectionService.
TouchInput A collection of TouchPoints and the Path connecting them
